summary:
As a famous man once said:
[QUOTE]"A house is the same size as the souls who live there."[/QUOTE]
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER]
[url=http://trustnohuman.de][img]http://trustnohuman.de/media/banner/tnh_presents.png[/img][/url]

[SIZE="5"][FONT="Arial Black"][COLOR=Blue]Breezehome Deluxe[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE="2"][COLOR=Red]Version 0.9beta by Misantrooper[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

As a famous man once said:
[QUOTE]"A house is the same size as the souls who live there."[/QUOTE]


[CENTER]
[URL=http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_aussen.bmp][IMG]http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_aussen_klein.png[/IMG][/URL]
[/CENTER]

First, sorry for my bad english. The following text is machine translated.



[s]The translation is not final. the book from the purchase is not translated in time.[/s]
the mod i now finally translated, when you can help me for better translation, send me a pm


for images look in the original thread:
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35494]TNH Brisenheim Deluxe German[/URL]


[img]http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_wichtig_EN.png[/img]
When you update from version 0.8 REMOVE all items from the house.



The mod [COLOR=Red]MUST[/COLOR] be installed before buying breezehome, otherwise there will be conflicts with the purchase dialog and triggers.
And read the Readme


[img]http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_vorraussetzung_EN.png[/img]
- Skyrim Patch 1.9.32.0.8
- Hearthfire


[img]http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_beschreibung_EN.png[/img]

The breezehome now has two options.
Either you simply can in the [URL=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35494-1-1367530943.jpg]prevailing chaos[/URL] a bed for yourself and Lydia, and a fire pit set up,
or,
You can renovate the house and so has a variety of upgrade options.
you should opt for renovation, You can buy the living room, dining area, bedroom and alchemy/enchantment area.
Furthermore, you can lower the house cellars, which upgrades the kitchen and forge are available. After buying the kitchen the children bedroom is purchasable.
The basement currently offers without further requirements to access the catacombs, which serve as the central collection point for looted treasures.

[center][youtube]2Tl-8Hlvy1A[/youtube][/center]



Small statistics:
[list]
[*]5 Bookshelves for a total of 130 books
[*]26 NON-Respawn Container
[*]7 Weapon Mounts for 2 weapon and shield
[*]8 Weapon Rack + shield holders for various principalities
[*]18 Weapon showcases with activator
[*]7 Dagger showcases with activator
[*]10 Busts for dragon priest masks
[*]10 Mounts for dragon claws
[*]8 Bow standa
[*]18 Mannequins
[*]1 Mount for the "Ebony blade" from which it does not fall out everything GUARANTEED
[*]1 Mount for the "Elder scroll(dragon)"
[*]1 Secret Room for (hopefully) all the Daedric Artifacts (Where is the Secret Room will not reveal ;))
[*][COLOR=Red]NEW 0.9:[/COLOR] Shrines of the Divine
[/list]

[img]http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_empfohlen_EN.png[/img]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9936/]A Realistic Hope ENB The photorealistic ENB[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652/]Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix[/URL]





[img]http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_kompatibel_EN.png[/img]
The mod should be compatible with all other mods that do not affect the breezehome or the bailiff of whiterun.



[img]http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_credits_EN.png[/img]

[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17423]Artisanix - Paintings and Frames[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14134]Blary - OpenBooks Resource[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30599]Blary - Alchemy Clutter Resource[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525]Oaristys and Tony67 - Modders Resource Pack[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11992]uglydemon - Intact Banners[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18732]Sydzilla - Markarth City Banner Retexture[/URL]


[CENTER]
[URL="http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_geheimraum.bmp"][IMG]http://download.trustnohuman.de/skyrim/tnh_geheimraum_klein.png[/IMG][/URL]
Who finds the secret room?
[/CENTER]
author: TNH-Modding

files.name: TNH Brisenheim Deluxe
files.changelogHtml:
General
- The catacombs were transferred into a separate cell to increase the performance on slower machines.
- Lights again revised. This time, according to the principle: Where there is no light source is also no light.
- The Shadowcaster of the chandeliers removed and relocated to an optional plugin. You find it in the download section from the German file.
